channel.title: Item bonuses
channel.description: Hi guys, I added a few weapons like statius for admin wear, and they don't have any bonuses. Can someone tell me how to add bonuses, this is a 317 server and my source is Pk Planet V6. I know that the item bonuses stuff is in item.cfg or whatever, but what do i edit?

item.title: Item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

[quote=“Lorenzo Vq, post:4, topic:340977”]i know :)… so go into your source folder, and find a notepad called Item.cfg, Press Ctrl+F and find whatever it is that you want to change… the stats of, you can change the things to this: (dont do it if the item ids are different from the following)

//Statius item = 9813 Statius_full_helm P 500 500 500 3 3 4 -6 -2 65 70 63 -1 71 3 0 item = 9812 Statius_Platelegs P 500 500 500 3 3 5 -21 -7 110 106 97 -4 121 3 0 item = 9811 Statius_Platebody P 500 500 500 5 5 7 -30 -10 154 145 121 -6 157 5 0 item = 9814 Statius_Warhammer T 500 500 500 -4 123 123 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 114 0 //Morrigan item = 9810 Morrigan_coif P 500 500 500 0 0 0 -5 13 8 11 14 8 12 0 0 item = 9808 Morrigan_Body P 500 500 500 0 0 0 -15 36 61 53 66 75 62 0 0 item = 9809 Morrigan_Chaps P 500 500 500 0 0 0 -10 23 35 29 37 46 35 0 0 item = 9821 Morrigan_Throwing_axe T 500 500 500 0 85 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 85 0 item = 9820 Morrigan_Javelin T 500 500 500 0 100 70 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 100 0 //Vesta item = 9801 Vesta_Plateskirt P 500 500 500 3 5 5 -17 -4 86 100 112 -2 118 3 0 item = 9800 Vesta_Chainbody P 500 500 500 5 7 7 -15 0 120 131 145 -3 140 6 0 item = 9802 Vesta_Longsword T 500 500 500 106 121 -2 0 0 1 4 3 0 0 118 0 item = 9803 Vesta_Spear T 500 500 500 133 113 120 0 0 18 21 21 0 0 122 0 //Zuriel item = 9805 Zuriels_Robe_Bottom P 500 500 500 0 0 0 25 -7 38 35 44 24 0 0 0 item = 9804 Zuriels_Robe P 500 500 500 0 0 0 35 -10 63 45 74 35 0 0 0 item = 9807 Zuriel_Hood P 500 500 500 0 0 0 8 -2 20 16 22 8 0 0 0 item = 9806 Zuriel_staff P 500 500 500 13 -1 65 18 0 5 7 4 18 0 72 0 //Full elite item = 9991 Elite_Pl8legs P 1000 1000 1000 3 5 5 -17 -4 86 100 112 -2 118 3 0 item = 9990 Elite_Pl8body P 1000 1000 1000 5 7 7 -15 0 120 131 145 -3 140 6 0 item = 9986 Elite_Fullhelm T 1000 1000 1000 106 121 -2 0 0 1 4 3 0 0 118 0

This is what the code means…

1: Shop Price (the first number) 2: Low Alch Value (the second number) 3: High Alch Value (the third number etc...) 4: Stab Att Boost 5: Slash Att Boost 6: Crush Att Boost 7: Magic Att Boost 8: Range Att Boost 9: Stab Def Boost 10: Slash Def Boost 11: Crush Def Boost 12: Magic Def Boost 13: Range Def Boost 14: Strength Boost 15: Prayer Boost[/quote]
Isn’t that the completely same thing i explained only in horizontal form??? :DDDD

Read full topic

item.title: Item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I wish I could rep you guys

Read full topic

item.title: Item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @Lorenzo_Vq Lorenzo Vq
item.description:
@Lorenzo_Vq wrote:

i know :)… so go into your source folder, and find a notepad called Item.cfg, Press Ctrl+F and find whatever it is that you want to change… the stats of, you can change the things to this: (dont do it if the item ids are different from the following)

//Statius item = 9813 Statius_full_helm P 500 500 500 3 3 4 -6 -2 65 70 63 -1 71 3 0 item = 9812 Statius_Platelegs P 500 500 500 3 3 5 -21 -7 110 106 97 -4 121 3 0 item = 9811 Statius_Platebody P 500 500 500 5 5 7 -30 -10 154 145 121 -6 157 5 0 item = 9814 Statius_Warhammer T 500 500 500 -4 123 123 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 114 0 //Morrigan item = 9810 Morrigan_coif P 500 500 500 0 0 0 -5 13 8 11 14 8 12 0 0 item = 9808 Morrigan_Body P 500 500 500 0 0 0 -15 36 61 53 66 75 62 0 0 item = 9809 Morrigan_Chaps P 500 500 500 0 0 0 -10 23 35 29 37 46 35 0 0 item = 9821 Morrigan_Throwing_axe T 500 500 500 0 85 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 85 0 item = 9820 Morrigan_Javelin T 500 500 500 0 100 70 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 100 0 //Vesta item = 9801 Vesta_Plateskirt P 500 500 500 3 5 5 -17 -4 86 100 112 -2 118 3 0 item = 9800 Vesta_Chainbody P 500 500 500 5 7 7 -15 0 120 131 145 -3 140 6 0 item = 9802 Vesta_Longsword T 500 500 500 106 121 -2 0 0 1 4 3 0 0 118 0 item = 9803 Vesta_Spear T 500 500 500 133 113 120 0 0 18 21 21 0 0 122 0 //Zuriel item = 9805 Zuriels_Robe_Bottom P 500 500 500 0 0 0 25 -7 38 35 44 24 0 0 0 item = 9804 Zuriels_Robe P 500 500 500 0 0 0 35 -10 63 45 74 35 0 0 0 item = 9807 Zuriel_Hood P 500 500 500 0 0 0 8 -2 20 16 22 8 0 0 0 item = 9806 Zuriel_staff P 500 500 500 13 -1 65 18 0 5 7 4 18 0 72 0 //Full elite item = 9991 Elite_Pl8legs P 1000 1000 1000 3 5 5 -17 -4 86 100 112 -2 118 3 0 item = 9990 Elite_Pl8body P 1000 1000 1000 5 7 7 -15 0 120 131 145 -3 140 6 0 item = 9986 Elite_Fullhelm T 1000 1000 1000 106 121 -2 0 0 1 4 3 0 0 118 0

This is what the code means…

1: Shop Price (the first number) 2: Low Alch Value (the second number) 3: High Alch Value (the third number etc...) 4: Stab Att Boost 5: Slash Att Boost 6: Crush Att Boost 7: Magic Att Boost 8: Range Att Boost 9: Stab Def Boost 10: Slash Def Boost 11: Crush Def Boost 12: Magic Def Boost 13: Range Def Boost 14: Strength Boost 15: Prayer Boost

item.title: Item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

item = 9802	Vesta_Longsword	        This_is_the_great_sword_vesta.	500000	45000000	500000	101	137	25	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	134	10

well this is the code you need to add.

item = ItemID Item_Name Item_Examine BuyPrice SellPrice AlchPrice StabAttack  SlashAttack CrushAttack MagicAttack RangeAttack StabDef SlashDef CrushDef MagicDef RangeDef StrBonus PrayBonus

Well i can’t explain more precise

Read full topic
